citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last IACUC meeting was last held in August 2018. The facilities program for humane care and use of animals
shall be reviewed once every 6 months.
CORRECT BY : 8/11/19
The inspection of records was conducted with office employees and by phone with the CEO.
